title: Cascade Components offer progressive, longer travel link for the Norco Optic
content:
Cascade Components has CNC machined an aftermarket link for the Norco Optic short-travel trail bike. Increasing progression from 17% to 23%, it concomitantly increases travel by 5mm taking it up to 130mm. So, how does that change the rear endâ€™s behaviour, and does it require a longer stroke shock? The post Cascade Components offer progressive, longer travel link for the Norco Optic appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
